name: whatsapp web version dark
description: Another dark one for whatsapp web..
css:
/* Created  by Antonio Ferreiro Ferrero "a3cAnton" 24-01-2017 */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document domain("whatsapp.com"){body,header *,.chat-drag-cover .chat span,.menu-item,.menu-item a,.msg-unread-body,.drawer-section-body-expand.chatlist .chat *,[class*="input"],.infinite-list-item *:not(.list-title),.contact *,.drawer-section *,.chatlist.list-profile *,.chatlist.list-icons.list-settings *,.list-action *,[class*="header"] *,.well-chat-name,.dropdown-item-action{color:#ccc!important}.chat-drag-cover .chat:hover span,.menu-item:hover,.menu-item:hover a,[class*="butterbar"]{color:#cfe!important}[class*="media"] [class*="text"] *,.media-content .media-caption{color:#000!important;text-shadow:1px 1px  0 #cfc!important}body,.pane-body.pane-list-body,#app,.app,select > option,.drawer,.subheader-search,.block-compose,.dropdown,.drawer-section-expand,.drawer-section-body-expand.chatlist,.drawer-section-body-expand.chatlist .chat,.list-title,.contact,.drawer-section-info,.menu-tabs,.pane-chat-footer,div.infinite-list-item .chat-drag-cover .chat:not(.active),.popup-container .popup,.app,.media-viewer,.chatlist-panel-body,.chatlist-panel-search,.list-search,.cont-input-search,.list-search .input-placeholder{background:none #444!important}div[class="pane pane-two"],.pane-preview-wrapper-bg,.pane-chat-tile,.drawer-body-msg-info,div[class="animate-enter1 with-input drawer-section well"],.drawer-body,.chatlist.list-profile,.chatlist.list-profile .chat,.chatlist.list-icons.list-settings,.chatlist.list-icons.list-settings .chat,.emoji-panel-body,.well,.well-simple,.well-chat,.multi-vcard-dialog-contact,.chat,.drawer-section-body.chatlist,.intro,.emoji-panel,.emoji-search-row,.emoji-search,.dropdown-picker,.dropdown-picker .nib,.dropdown-emoji .emoji-panel-section,.list-search .input-search,.chatlist.chatlist-group-msg .infinite-list-viewport,.chatlist.chatlist-group-msg .drawer-section-title,.chatlist.chatlist-group-msg .drawer-section-footer,.section-header{background:none #222!important}.pane-chat,.subheader-search [class*="input"],.block-compose [class*="input"],.pane-chat-header:after,.subheader-search:after,.emojik,.drawer-section,.media-panel-header .media-chat,.emoji-search-row-input{background-color:transparent!important}  .media-content,.media-collection,.btn-fill,.backdrop{background-color:hsla(0,0%,0%,.7)!important}header,.pane-preview,.media-panel-header,.butterbar-notification,.multi-controls{background:#222 linear-gradient(180deg,hsla(0,0%,99%,.3),hsla(0,0%,0%,.1))!important}div.infinite-list-item .chat-drag-cover .chat.active,.drawer-blocked .list-action,.menu-tabs>.menu-item.active,.btn,button.menu-tab.active{background-color:#444!important;background-image:radial-gradient(ellipse farthest-corner at center bottom,hsla(99,50%,55%,.8) 0%,transparent 99%)!important}div.infinite-list-item .chat-drag-cover .chat:hover,div.infinite-list-item:hover .contact.chat,.menu-item:hover,.msg-unread-body,.incoming-msgs,.chatlist.list-icons.list-settings .chat:hover,.btn:hover,.butterbar-notification:hover,.chat.first:hover,.row.row-drawer-item.clickable:hover,.header-close button:hover,.multi-controls button:hover,.menu-tabs-marker,ul.dropdown-items li:hover{background-color:#333!important;background-image:radial-gradient(ellipse farthest-corner at center bottom,hsla(120,50%,55%,.8) 0%,transparent 99%)!important}.chat-body,.separator,.title-underlined,.drawer-info,[class*="pane"],.contact,.pane-chat-body,.row-body{border-color:#222!important}.row-body,.media-viewer-thumbs-container,.media-collection > div:nth-child(1),.cont-input-search{border-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3)!important}select,.subheader-search *,.block-compose,.block-compose *,.pane-chat-header:after,.subheader-search:after,.chat,.chat:hover:after,.chat.active:after,.chatlist [class*="body"],.chatlist.list-icons .chat:hover .chat-body,.chatlist.list-icons .location:hover .chat-body,.chatlist.list-icons .chat:hover .header-body,.chatlist.list-icons .location:hover .header-body,.chatlist.list-icons .chat:hover .chat-avatar,.chatlist.list-icons .location:hover .chat-avatar,.chatlist.list-icons .chat:hover .location-icon,.chatlist.list-icons .location:hover .location-icon,.menu-tabs>.menu-item.active,.list-action,[class*="media"],.drawer-title-action .icon{border-color:transparent!important}.media-canvas{outline-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3)!important}select,.cont-input-search,.input-container,div.infinite-list-item .chat-drag-cover .chat:hover,div.infinite-list-item:hover .contact.chat,.menu-item:hover,.msg-unread-body,.incoming-msgs,div.infinite-list-item .chat-drag-cover .chat.active,.chatlist.list-icons.list-settings .chat:hover,.drawer-blocked .list-action:hover,.menu-tabs>.menu-item.active,.btn:hover,.chat.first:hover,.row.row-drawer-item.clickable:hover,.header-close button:hover,.multi-controls button:hover,button.menu-tab.active,button.menu-tab:hover{box-shadow:0 1px 5px 0 #000 inset,0 -1px 1px 0 hsl(0,0%,60%) inset!important}.icon-pencil:hover,.block-compose button:hover{box-shadow:0 1px 5px 0 #fff inset,0 -1px 1px 0 #444 inset!important}div.infinite-list-item .chat,.chatlist.list-settings .chat,.btn{box-shadow:0 1px 1px 0 hsl(0,0%,50%) inset,0 -1px 1px 0 #111 inset!important}.emojik:hover,.drawer-title-action .icon:hover{box-shadow: 0 0 9px #fff!important}[class*="icon-"]:not([class*="count"]):not([class*="icon-emoji-"]):not([class*="user"]):not([class*="avatar"]):not([class*="dblcheck-"]):not([class*="icon-search-morph"]):not([class*="back-light"]),.select::before{filter:invert(1)!important;-webkit-filter:invert(1)!important}span[class="icon btn-close-drawer icon-back-light"],.btn-close-drawer.icon-x-light,.checkbox-container:hover,.icon-x:hover{filter:brightness(300)!important;-webkit-filter:brightness(300)!important}select,span.emojik,button.menu-tab{border-radius:6px!important}.header-close button,.icon-pencil,.drawer-title-action .icon:hover,.multi-controls button:hover,.block-compose button:hover{border-radius:50%!important}}
